entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: Use ExecutionStrategy for query execution #35692
    10.0.0
  • Some StartsWith scenarios are non-SARGable when they perhaps could be? Was it considered before? #35691

Closed

  • Update on a single record caused cascade update on entire table, setting all foreign key fields to NULL when upgrading from 3.0 to 7.0 #35595
  • Update of FK with Include of Reference will be ignored #35684
  • Scaffold uses system's comma separator for HasDefaultValue #35654
    10.0.0
  • First migrations log error that is a false positive #35690
  • Clarification on error with `Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design` #35685

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0-staging] Set the environment when executing Scaffold-DBContext #35693

Merged

  • Use InvariantCulture for ChangeType() and decimal.TryParse() #35675
    community-contribution
  • Revert "[release/2.3] Use latest available Microsoft.AspNetCore.Hosting.WebHostBuilderFactory.Sources" #35688

Updated

  • Improve LoadExtension to work correctly with dotnet run and lib* named libs #35617
    community-contribution
